name: Sovereign Tea
storyline: Under threat of invasion from the Coffee Empire, the 12 Tea Princesses of the independent Tea Realms must overcome their differences to defend their lands. Gather resources and brew Tea Minions to your side to counter the enemy's strategy in this grid-based mechanics-focused title. Featuring 12 playable characters, 25 fine-tuned levels, and 40+ Tea Minions to brew and discover, Sovereign Tea aims to be a unique and fun video game for all lovers of strategy and tea.
summary: Command the Tea Princesses to victory over the Coffee Empire in this adorable Strategy RPG! Brew your minions, position your armies, and tactically press forward to achieve victory.
